channel.title: NPCDrops.TSM help
channel.description:
Hello
I am having trouble trying to understand how to edit the drop odds of specific items on specific monsters. For some servers its really simple and it looks like this:
//goblin npcdrop = 100 526 1 100
I have no problem understanding this. However for most of the sources ive been downloading have the file NPCDrops.cfg set out like this:
1 995 9 995 1624 3140 1249 1247 561 995 1617 1619 1213 1249 1247 561 995 1617 1619 1213 1249 1247 561 995 1617 1619 1213 554 554 554 554 554 554 554 1249 1247 561 995 1617 1619 1213 1249 1247 561 995 1617 1619 1213 1249 1247 561 995 1617 1619 1213
I cant seem to make any sense of this. I have tried googling the problem several times and have found the drops for these sorts of sources can be edited in NPCDrops.TSM. But it still doesnt make sense to me for example:
#growler 6250:50 995:30000 886:120 207:2 808:100 563:50 385:3 405:1 11730:1 11710:1 11712:1 11714:1 11710:1 11712:1 15050:1
What I understand from this is that the first number (in this case 6250) is for the NPC growler, simple enough. However I dont understand what the :50 is for. Some tell me the 50 is the drop odds for growler. The drop odds for what? every drop?
The other number sequences makes sense. For instance I understand that 995:30000 means that one of growlers drops are 30000 coins (995 being the item ID, 30000 being the quantity). But how are the drop odds for this drop determined? It doesnt make any sense to me
If someone could walk me through the NPCDrops.TSM file I would be VERY appreciative :)! thanks!
